mapper.select: SELECT -- eqid, -- earthquake_name, -- earthquake_full_name, -- eq_addr, ST_AsText(geom) AS geom, -- intensity, -- depth, -- occurrence_time, -- eq_type, -- source, -- eq_addr_code, -- town_code, -- is_deleted, -- magnitude, -- create_time, -- update_time, -- district, -- province, -- city FROM xian_earthquake_list -- ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC
